Other Kobalt clients who celebrated ASCAP Pop Awards include: Max Martin (for the songs "Hot N Cold," "My Life Would Suck Without You," and "Please Don't Leave Me"); Ryan Tedder (for the songs "Already Gone," "Bleeding Love," and "Halo"); Al Shuckburgh (for the song "Empire State of Mind"); Scott "Kid Cudi" Mescudi (for the songs "Day N' Nite" and "Heartless"); and Desmond Child (for the song "Waking Up In Vegas"). Additionally, Prescription Songs writer/producer Allan Grigg (aka Kool Kojak) received an ASCAP award for the song "Right Round."
